parallel: Mitsetse miviri munzvimbo ine mativi maviri isingasangane
ndege: Nzvimbo yakati sandara ine mativi maviri panogona kuzvambarara zvinhu zvine mativi maviri
point: Nzvimbo chaiyo pamutsetse, ndege, kana muchadenga
side: Mitsetse zvikamu muzvikamu zvejometri zvinoumba kunze kwechinhu
vertex: Nzvimbo panosangana mativi maviri echiumbwa chine mativi maviri kana mipendero miviri yemufananidzo une mativi matatu.
denderedzwa: Chimiro chemativi maviri umo mapoinzi ese pamutsetse wakakomberedzwa akaenzana kubva panzvimbo yepakati.
rectangle: A maviri-dimensional, akavharwa, mana-mativi chimiro chine makona mana ekurudyi
square: Rudzi rwakakosha rwerectangle ine mativi akaenzana uye mativi akatarisana akapesana
cube: Chimiro chine mativi matatu ane masikweya akafanana sezviso
